title: Pumpkin Scissors
synopsis: Three years ago, the long war between the Royal Empire and the Republic of Frost came to an end. With both nations a long way from recovery, a passionate young woman named Alice L. Malvin leads the Pumpkin Scissors, a unit of the imperial army specializing in war relief.
voices: ['Miyake, Kenta', 'Itou, Shizuka', 'Toriumi, Kousuke', 'Majima, Junji', 'Ogawa, Kazuki', 'Ueda, Kana', 'Suzuki, Chihiro', 'Narita, Sayaka', 'Taniyama, Kishou', 'Cho']
staff: [['Akiyama, Katsuhito', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Watanabe, Jun', ['Sound Director']], ['Abe, Masashi', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Nishouji, Yoshihito', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
